title: why do i get a dump file error when going into player select screen
body: it just pops up and then 9/10 i get to wait because i get the blocker and i didnt even leave makes me so mad is there a way to fix this today i am up to a 15 minute wait

replies.body: still does the same thing ive repaired uninstalled and reinstalled still the same

Getting that dump file error most likely means that your game encountered some type of crash. Usually the bug splat would pop up to let you know what went wrong, but in this case, the bug splat actually had a crash as well which is what that dump file error meant. Most of the time you can fix this up by running a repair through the client options, but hit me back up if that doesn't work!
